Title: The Wolfman
Overview: Lawrence Talbot, an American man on a visit to Victorian London to make amends with his estranged father, gets bitten by a werewolf and, after a moonlight transformation, leaves him with a savage hunger for flesh.
Tagline: When the moon is full the legend comes to life
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Stuber Productions, Relativity Media
Cast: Benicio del Toro, Anthony Hopkins, Emily Blunt
clean_text: wolfman lawrence talbot american man visit victorian london amend estranged father get bite werewolf moonlight transformation leave savage hunger flesh moon legend come life horror history drama thriller joe johnston benicio del toro anthony hopkins emily blunt 2010
